short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fischer is a fact-checking tool developed to curb misinformation by democratizing and unveiling the fact-checking process.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fischer is a fact-checking tool developed to curb misinformation by democratizing and unveiling the fact-checking process.

To use, sign up for an account on https://fischer-five.vercel.app/posts. Then start using the App!
